card.name: Morse, Grave Robber Doll
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ When you put this creature, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Kubrick, Spiral Accelerator
card.text: ■ Multi ■ If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "Speed attacker". ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Crossfire, Millionaire
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: 5000GT, Riot
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Speed Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all psychic creatures. Then destroy all creatures that have power 5000 or less. ■ Players can't summon creatures that have power 5000 or less or put psychic creatures into the battle zone.

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Iwashin, One Man Army
card.text: ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Obuza 08, Demon Dragon Armored/Beginning of the End
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each creature in your graveyard until the End Step ========================= ■ Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Changethe, Dragon Armored Ship/Fourth of the Six Bizarre ~Earth Breaking Waterfall~
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, draw 2 cards, then discard a card from your hand. ■ Each turn, when a spell that costs 5 or less is discarded from your hand for the first time, you may cast that spell For No Cost ========================= ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can only attack or block with a creature once each turn.

card.name: Katsuking, Victory Kung Fu
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ During your turn, this creature has infinite power while battling. ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures that have power 6000 or more. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may draw 2 cards. ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard and you have no '''Katsuking, Victory Kung Fu''' in the battle zone, you may discard a card from your hand and destroy one of your Outrages. If you do, put this creature.

card.name: Jackie, Infinity Dream/"Our Dreams Will Never End!"
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Your opponent's spells cost infinite mana to cast. ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ You may put an Outrage that costs 8 or less from your hand. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. If you do, those 2 creatures battle.

card.name: Pulsar, Trust Suction
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, draw a card then discard a card. ■ If you have 6 or more cards in your graveyard, this creature gets "blocker".

card.name: Bruce, Clearly Drive/"No hesitation. I have decided on what I must do."
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ If you have less than 13 cards in your graveyard, this creature can't attack. ■ At the End Step ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard.

card.name: Testa Rossa, Burn the Heart
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw up to 2 cards. Then discard the same number of cards you drew.
